description: Contains care plan problem discipline priority information.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: DISC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The linked discipline record ID. This column is frequently used to link to the DISCIPLINE table.

columns.name: DISC_TYPE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: DISC_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the care plan problem discipline priority.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISC_RESOLVED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the care plan problem for the discipline is resolved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


YES


NO

columns.name: DISC_RESOLVED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the care plan problem was resolved.

columns.name: HH_PROB_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Home Health and Hospice disciplines linked to the problem.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
